content.rendered:
The MAXTRAX mini Bag is designed and engineered for adventure.

The heavy duty, four layer, weather resistant carry bag provides functional and stylish storage for all your MAXTRAX mini Tracks – keeping mud, sand, dirt and snow out of your vehicle. This dynamic bag will safely store up yo 4 MAXTRAX minis or 2 MAXTRAX Jaxbases & 2 MAXTRAX minis

Externally the zippers have provisions for the use of a padlock; internally the bright safety orange material is teamed with the protective black mesh, protecting the tracks and the bag from all environmental weather factors.  This bag comes complete with a small internal storage.

(MAXTRAX NOT INCLUDED).

*Sized for MAXTRAX mini and Jaxbase only.
Weight: 1kg.
Size: A spacious 700mm x 340mm wide bag; holds up to 4 MAXTRAX mini or up to 2 MAXTRAX mini & 2 Jaxbase.
Colour: Black.
Please note: Actual colour may vary slightly from images shown.
Warranty: We back our confidence in this quality product with a 12 month warranty against faulty materials and workmanship.
Shipping: This product can be shipped to Post Office Boxes.
Australian orders: Shipping cost is automatically calculated when ordering.
International orders: Shipping cost is manually calculated once your order is received. You will be advised by email the total cost of your order including shipping (International shipping is NOT free).

excerpt.rendered: MAXTRAX Mini Carry Bag Black
